languages.text:
"От целого осталась только часть,
Предательство истерло остальное.
Коль дорожишь ты отзвуком его,
Я услужу тебе — взамен на то,
Что ты услужишь смеху без начала".

traits.locale_text:
"От целого осталась только часть,
Предательство истерло остальное.
Коль дорожишь ты отзвуком его,
Я услужу тебе — взамен на то,
Что ты услужишь смеху без начала".

languages.text:
"A fragment's all that's left of what was whole,
The rest now worn away by treachery.
But if you prize this repercussion so,
This gesture I'll perform, and in return,
The laugh with no beginning you will serve."
languages.original_text:
"От целого осталась только часть,
Предательство истерло остальное.
Коль дорожишь ты отзвуком его,
Я услужу тебе — взамен на то,
Что ты услужишь смеху без начала".

"A fragment's all that's left of what was whole,

languages.text:
“一度完整之物，如今已只剩下余烬。
其余的一切，早已被背叛消磨殆尽。
然而，你若是如此看重这样的回音。
我对你打个响指，作为回报，
你将要侍奉无始无休的欢笑。”
languages.original_text:
"A fragment's all that's left of what was whole,
The rest now worn away by treachery.
But if you prize this repercussion so,
This gesture I'll perform, and in return,
The laugh with no beginning you will serve."

我对你打个响指，作为回报，
你将要侍奉无始无休的欢笑。”

languages.text:
«Queda solo un fragmento de lo que era,
tras la cruel erosión de la traición.
Pero, si tanto valoras esta repercusión,
ese favor te concederé y, por tu cuenta,
a la risa sin principio te rendirás en sumisión».
languages.original_text:
"A fragment's all that's left of what was whole,
The rest now worn away by treachery.
But if you prize this repercussion so,
This gesture I'll perform, and in return,
The laugh with no beginning you will serve."

a la risa sin principio te rendirás en sumisión».

languages.text:
「残されているのは断片だけ
あとは裏切りによりすり減ったが
君がこの反響をそれほどまでに望むなら
君の望みに応える代わりに
始まりのない笑いに仕えたまえ」
languages.original_text:
"A fragment's all that's left of what was whole,
The rest now worn away by treachery.
But if you prize this repercussion so,
This gesture I'll perform, and in return,
The laugh with no beginning you will serve."

君の望みに応える代わりに
始まりのない笑いに仕えたまえ」

languages.text:
"Vom Ganzen ein Fragment nur noch besteht,
all der Rest abgetragen vom Verrat.
Doch ist die Vergeltung so wichtig Euch,
so führe die Geste also ich aus,
wenn Ihr dem Lachen ohne Anfang dient."
languages.original_text:
"A fragment's all that's left of what was whole,
The rest now worn away by treachery.
But if you prize this repercussion so,
This gesture I'll perform, and in return,
The laugh with no beginning you will serve."

Doch ist die Vergeltung so wichtig Euch,
so führe die Geste also ich aus,
wenn Ihr dem Lachen ohne Anfang dient."

languages.text:
« Du tout, il ne demeure plus qu'une partie,
Le reste s'est vu érodé par la duperie.
Mais si cet écho vous intéresse tant,
Je ferai ce geste, et réciproquement,
Vous servirez le rire sans commencement. »
languages.original_text:
"A fragment's all that's left of what was whole,
The rest now worn away by treachery.

The laugh with no beginning you will serve."

languages.text:
"Bir zamanlarki hâlinden kalmış geriye bir parça,
Kalleşlik tüketmiş gerisini yavaşça.
Madem bu yankı oldu içine dert,
Yapacağım istediğini ancak önce tek bir şart:
Sen de başlangıcı olmayan kahkahayı şımart."
languages.original_text:
"A fragment's all that's left of what was whole,
The rest now worn away by treachery.
But if you prize this repercussion so,
This gesture I'll perform, and in return,
The laugh with no beginning you will serve."
